name: MyPhoneExplorer Backup File
summary: Learn about .MPB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: MPB files can be imported and exported using the MyPhoneExplorer program.

description: File created by MyPhoneExplorer, a program used for syncing desktop computers and Sony Ericsson mobile phones; contains backed up phone data for contacts and SMS messages; used for backing up and restoring contacts between mobile phones and when recovering from a mobile device error.
